title: 'Alternative Facts' - Inauguration Crowd Size
summary: Trump's first official lie as president - claiming 'the largest audience to ever witness an inauguration.' Kellyanne Conway defended false claims as 'alternative facts,' birthing the term.
keyFacts: Trump claimed 'the largest audience to ever witness an inauguration, period, both in person and around the globe'
Aerial photos showed Obama's 2009 crowd was approximately 3x larger
Crowd expert estimate: Obama 2009 had 1.8 million; Trump had ~200,000
Metro ridership: 570,557 for Trump vs. 1.1 million for Obama 2009
